fields.text: Welcome to Cricket Health in San Francisco, where we empower kidney patients to take charge of their health.
If you are a new patient and would like information on our kidney care program, press [INDEX].
For program details and eligibility requirements, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we connect you to our program information team.
To speak with a new patient coordinator, press [INDEX].
One moment please while we transfer you to a new patient coordinator.
If you are an existing patient or need support with your care, press [INDEX].
For appointment scheduling and telehealth visits, press [INDEX].
Please hold as we connect you to our scheduling department.
If you are an existing patient or need support with your care, press [INDEX].
For billing, insurance, and payment questions, press [INDEX].
One moment please while we transfer you to billing and insurance support.
